div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1054 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1947 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 11+ AE. In basement room in upper town Olbia: fish-shaped AE ("several") 8 A (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 4 [1], 10-11 [4], 12 [2], 16 [1]) Unc.: 3 AE Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
